title: Kerchief, ca. 1805
description: Kerchief with a Chinoiserie border design printed in black on a red ground with yellow flowerheads. Mustard yellow central field with small areas and foliage patterns reserved in white. Design in horizontal-perpendicular repeat of four different groups of small Chinese figures in foliage or floral enframements in red, blue and green where printed over yellow and dark brown.
